title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
**Product Listing: Aromatherapy Candle Set - Gift for Special Occasions**

**Product Name:** 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16

**Product Details:**

- **Quantity:** 16 candles
- **Scents:** A delightful assortment of 16 scents including Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia.
- **Material:** Natural soy wax, with added essential oils for a pure and pleasant aroma.
- **Burn Time:** Each candle has a burn time of 18-20 hours, providing ample enjoyment and relaxation.
- **Container Type:** Tin can, designed for easy portability and recyclability.
- **Recyclable:** The tin cans are fully recyclable, making them a sustainable choice.
- **Alternative Uses:** Tin cans can be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations.
- **Safety Note:** Keep out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

**Ideal Gift for:** Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend

**Package:** This set is perfect for gifting and is an excellent choice for adding a touch of luxury and relaxation to any home. Whether you're looking to create a serene atmosphere, celebrate a special occasion, or simply enjoy a moment of peace, these candles are a wonderful way to do so.

**Why Choose Our Aromatherapy Candles:**
- **Natural and Safe:** Made from natural soy wax and essential oils for a clean and healthy burn.
- **Durable and Portable:** Tin cans provide a sturdy and portable packaging solution.
- **Environmentally Friendly:** Recyclable and repurposable tin cans promote sustainability.
- **Elevate Your Space:** Enjoy the ambiance and fragrance of these candles, perfect for any home or office.

**Shipping Information:** Standard shipping applies. Orders are typically processed and shipped within 2-3 business days.

**Customer Reviews:** Discover the joy of our aromatherapy candles and leave a review to share your experience with others.

**Customer Support:** For any questions or concerns, our customer support team is here to assist you.

**FAQs:**
- **Q: How long does each candle burn?**
  - A: Each candle burns for approximately 18-20 hours.
- **Q: Are these candles safe to use?**
  - A: Yes, they are safe when used according to the safety instructions provided.
- **Q: Can the tin cans be repurposed?**
  - A: Yes, the tin cans can be used as flowerpots or home decorations after use.

**Make a thoughtful and fragrant gift today!**
